name: PiN Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3.3 GHz or better, or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® compatible sound card)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3.7 GHz or better, or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 2070 or AMD Radeon™ RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
